CHAT.comment: CURTIS DARNELL JOHNSON, Petitioner v. UNITED STATES.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:07 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF LISA CALL ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF LEONDRA R. KRUGER ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF LISA CALL ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
